open.title: Metrofibre outage | Clayville
open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Clayville, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.description: We are investigating reports of limited connection affecting some clients on the Unifybr Afrihost network.. We are working on identifying the root cause and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Vumatel technicians are still busy with repairs.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Frogfoot| Villademardi
open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Villademardi and surrounding areas. Affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Vumatel Outage | Western Cape
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity for Vumatel clients in the Western Cape. We have reached out to Vumatel for confirmation of a possible outage. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Vumatel Outage | National
closed.description: We are working with Vumatel to investigate the root cause of connectivity issues affecting some clients. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: The outage is now resolved, and clients should have connectivity. Please reboot your router if you are not able to connect. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Services are almost fully restored to all affected clients. Clients that are still experiencing an issue can reboot their router to restore connectivity.
We are working with Vumatel to fully restore connectivity to all affected clients. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Vumatel Outage | Western Cape
closed.description: Vumatel core network engineers are busy with an Emergency network change ref CHG-000007960. Traffic is being rerouted to the new network environment. Affected clients will experience no connectivity during the change window. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Metrofibre Outage | Douglasdale
closed.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting  Douglasdale and surrounding areas. Affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Frogfoot| Richards Bay
closed.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting the Mzingazi Node. Affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: The Frogfoot technician has tested from Mzingazi and found that a fibre break at 7.6km.

FrogFoot engineering team has rerouted traffic through a backhaul, is currently awaiting a capacity upgrade, and is not in use. While this has restored connectivity, we will keep the outage open until the original backhaul is fully restored. This ensures traffic can be returned to its intended path, as the current routing poses a risk of congestion.

closed.title: Vumatel Outage | National
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Vumatel network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Impact has been mitigated, and we are monitoring for stability. If you are still experiencing issues, you can reach out by logging a callback in ClientZone, sending an email to support@afrihost.com, or reaching out on WhatsApp. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
